Email.subject: good work out there
Email.content:
Hi $name,
Great commercial! Loved the hustle, [[little man|little lady]]! Oh yeah!
Unfortunately we can't use this commercial. It really sucked, execs didn't like it.
Look, we just want to make a few little changes, then the commercial will be good to go! It's really almost there. Go to the studio to see our new ideas, I think you'll love them!
We like to give our top talent something to show our appreciation. Check outside your front door for the package.
-Susan Producer, EB Productions, Inc.
